name: Capy Inc.
description: Developer of online security software designed to protect websites against password brute-force attacks, spam and fraud. The company's software offers sable CAPTCHAs and other authentication alternatives to make login procedures secure, enabling users to protect enterprise websites in a hassle-free manner.
